title: Goddess of Were
description: [Siren Ménage Everlasting: Erotic Paranormal Ménage a Quatre Romance, M/F/M/M, werewolves, HEA]Batya Venificus has lost her wolf while trying to maintain face in the human world. She decides that she wants to be in control of giving up her virginity and picks the perfect man. But her mates show up, as evil rogues abduct her. She is stubborn and independent as she fights her own destiny and the mates meant to complete her.Derry, Eamon, and Talib Sinclair are warriors and used to the motto, "Improvise, adapt and overcome." So when their defiant mate loses focus of her wolf, and denies the attraction between them, they persuade her in ways only experienced wolves know how. With seduction, charm, and a bit of tough love, together they complete the mating bond. Now if only that evil power would stop getting in the way, so that Batya can see her true potential as their mate and as an Alpha wolf destined for greatness.
author: Dixie Lynn Dwyer
